instructions.title: Tap once to mark squares with mobile homes green. Try that here.
instructions.description: Look for the group of long rectangular buildings. You can tap this text box to move it out of the way.

hint.title: We've marked the correct squares green.

success.title: You found your first areas with mobile homes!
success.description: Swipe to the next screen to look for more.

instructions.title: If you are not sure, you can tap twice to mark the square yellow. Try that on this screen.
instructions.description: Look at the orientation of buildings - mobile homes may be at a diagonal.

hint.title: This is how the tiles should look.
hint.description: Swipe to try another again on a new screen.

success.title: Great. Twice for yellow to indicate if you're not sure.

instructions.title: Let's keep practicing.
instructions.description: Mark squares even if they have a mix of mobile homes and other buildings.

hint.title: Look at the diagonal of the buildings and the density.
hint.description: Here are the correct answers. Swipe to keep practicing.

instructions.title: Sometimes the shape of mobile home buildings are the same as other houses.
instructions.description: Mobile homes are usually smaller, denser, and may have white roofs.

hint.title: This one was more difficult.
hint.description: Here are the answers. Keep going!

success.title: Good work!
success.description: You will be a pro in no time.

instructions.title: Sometimes shipping containers look like mobile homes.
instructions.description: Look at the surroundings for clues.

hint.title: No mobile homes here. Containers may be near large warehouses or without space between them.
hint.description: If you're not sure you can tap twice to turn a square yellow.

success.title: Correct! No mobile homes here. The large warehouses and no spaces between the rectangles are clues they are containers.
success.description: If you're not sure you can tap twice to turn a square yellow.

instructions.title: Industrial sites can sometimes look like densely packed mobile homes.
instructions.description: Can you spot the differences here?

hint.title: This one was more difficult.
hint.description: Here are the correct answers. Keep learning!

success.title: You weren't fooled!
success.description: Thanks for sticking with it, there is a lot to show you!

instructions.title: Test your skills on this one.
instructions.description: Tap once to mark the squares with mobile homes green.

hint.title: Just one square here. Did the shipping containers trick you?

success.title: Those shipping containers didn't fool you.

instructions.title: There are Recreational Vehicles (RVs) in this image.

hint.title: Oops! This is an RV store, not a mobile home park.
hint.description: No one is living in those, so we can swipe past this.

success.title: This is an RV store, not a mobile home park.
success.description: No one is living in those. We can keep swiping.

instructions.title: There are Recreational Vehicles (RVs) in this image!
instructions.description: Do we tap them this time?

hint.title: See the designated roads, as well as spacing to provide light and access?
hint.description: The top 2 squares are inhabited RVs in a mobile home park.

success.title: Yes! The top 2 squares are inhabited RVs in a mobile home park.
success.description: The designated roads, as well as spacing to provide light and access.

instructions.title: Sometimes the shape of mobile home buildings are the same as other houses.
instructions.description: Mobile homes are usually smaller, denser, and may have white roofs.

hint.title: This one was more difficult.
hint.description: Here are the answers. Keep going!

success.title: Good work!
success.description: You will be a pro in no time.

instructions.title: Also look for clusters of small mobile homes surrounded by other buildings.
instructions.description: Mobile homes are not always in large groups.

hint.title: Just one square here. The correct answer is marked.
hint.description: Their size and proportions help them stand out.

success.title: Good job!
success.description: Their size and proportions help them stand out.

instructions.title: Mobile homes can be hidden among trees, and it may be difficult to recognize the shape, size, and orientation.
instructions.description: In this case, if you see a cluster of white spots, you may mark it as mobile homes.

hint.title: Compare what you thought with these correct answers.
hint.description: The trees make it more difficult.

success.title: You have sharp vision!
success.description: Thanks for taking the time to learn!

instructions.title: One more example with trees.
instructions.description: Can you spot the difference between the houses and the mobile homes?

hint.title: Review the correct answers.
hint.description: You can retake this tutorial at any time.

success.title: You got it!
success.description: Tree cover is no match for your identification skills!

instructions.title: Vacant spots paved for RVs or mobile homes can indicate a mobile home park.
instructions.description: Can you see spot those here?

instructions.title: Just a few more!
instructions.description: Remember: look at shape, size, orientation, density, roof color.

hint.title: Look at the diagonal of the buildings, their smaller size, and the density.
hint.description: Here are the correct answers. Keep practicing.

instructions.title: Nearly there!
instructions.description: Remember: look at shape, size, orientation, density, roof color.

hint.title: Not quite. Please review the correct answers.
hint.description: Roof color and the angled orientation help here.

success.title: Exactly!
success.description: Roof color and the angled orientation help here.

instructions.title: Second to last!
instructions.description: Remember: look at shape, size, orientation, density, roof color.

hint.title: Sorry, that was a trick.
hint.description: No mobile homes here, keep swiping.

success.title: There's no tricking you!
success.description: You're right, no mobile homes here. Keep swiping.

instructions.title: Mark 2 green and 1 yellow in this final one.
instructions.description: Remember: look at shape, size, orientation, density, roof color.

hint.title: Here are the correct answers.
hint.description: You can review this tutorial at any time.

success.title: Yay! You made it to the end.
success.description: You can review this tutorial at any time.
